reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 515/99: LOW-VOLUME CONSUMERS - SECTION 26 OF THE ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: LOW-VOLUME CONSUMERS — SECTION 26 OF THE ACT
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 515/99: LOW-VOLUME CONSUMERS - SECTION 26 OF THE ACT

content.content: 1. The amount of electricity referred to in the definition of “low-volume consumer” in subsection 26 (10) of the Act is 150,000 kilowatt hours.  O. Reg. 515/99, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The amount of electricity referred to in the definition of “low-volume consumer” in subsection 26 (10) of the Act is 150,000 kilowatt hours.  O. Reg. 515/99, s. 1.
